question: Q1 Here is a list of jobs that people you know may have. These people could be family or relatives, close friends or someone else you know. By 'knowing' a person, we mean that you know him/ her by name and well enough to contact him/ her. If you know several people who have a job from the list below, please only tick the box for the person who you feel closest to. Each of these jobs could be held by a woman or a man. Do you know a woman or a man who is…? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ON EACH LINE) Q1a A bus/ lorry driver

question: Q7 This section is about who you would turn to for help in different situations, if you needed it. For each of the following situations, please tick one box to say who you would turn to first. If there are several people you are equally likely to turn to, please tick the box for the one you feel closest to. Who would you turn to first to ... (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ON EACH LINE) Q7a … help you with a household or a garden job that you can't do yourself?

Q10 How often do you think that people would try to take advantage of you if they got the chance, and how often would they try to be fair? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.1: Try to take advantage almost all of the time
answer.2: Try to take advantage most of the time
answer.3: Try to be fair most of the time
answer.4: Try to be fair almost all of the time

question: Q11 Generally speaking, would you say that people can be trusted or that you can't be too careful in dealing with people? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.1: People can almost always be trusted
answer.3: You usually can't be too careful in dealing with people
answer.4: You almost always can't be too careful in dealing with people

answer.4: Two or three times a month

question: Q18 IF NOT CODE 8 'NEVER' IN Q17 At these occasions, how often do you make new friends or acquaintances? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

Q19 Please indicate about how many people do you have contact with on a typical weekday irrespective of whether you know them or not. Include anyone you chat with, talk to, or text, either face-to-face, by phone, internet or any other communication device. (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.1: All or almost all of them
answer.5: None or almost none of them

question: Q21 Please think about the parent you have contact with most frequently: How often do you have contact with that parent, either face-to-face, by phone, internet or any other communication device? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.4: Two to three times a month
answer.95: My parents are no longer alive
answer.96: The parent I have contact with the most frequently lives with me

question: Q22 Think about the brother or sister you have contact with most frequently: How often do you have contact with that brother or sister, either face-to-face, by phone, internet or any other communication device? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.4: Two to three times a month
answer.95: I do not have any brothers or sisters
answer.96: The brother or sister I have contact with the most frequently lives with me

question: Q23 Think about your adult child you have contact with most frequently: How often do you have contact with this child aged at least 18, either face-to-face, by phone, internet or any other communication device? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.4: Two to three times a month
answer.95: I do not have any adult children
answer.96: The adult child I have contact with the most frequently lives with me

question: Q24 Now, think about the other family member you have contact with most frequently, aside of your spouse or partner, parents, siblings or adult children. How often do you have contact with that family member, either face-to-face, by phone, internet or any other communication device? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.4: Two to three times a month
answer.95: I do not have other family members
answer.96: The other family member I have contact with the most frequently lives with me

question: Q25 And, think about the close friend you have contact with most frequently: How often do you have contact with that close friend, either face-to-face, by phone, internet or any other communication device? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.4: Two to three times a month
answer.95: I do not have any close friends
answer.96: The close friend I have contact with the most frequently lives with me

question: Q26 Think about the occasions when you talk, get in touch with your family members and your close friends. How many times does this happen in the form of a text message/ a cell phone conversation or another internet communication tool? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

answer.1: All or almost all of it

question: Q36 Now think about the person from your religious community, other than your family members, you have contact with most frequently. How often do you have contact with that person, either face-to-face, by phone, internet or any other communication device? (PLEASE TICK ONE BOX ONLY)

question: Derived from: 'WHAT IS THE HIGHEST LEVEL OF EDUCATION THAT YOUR SPOUSE OR PARTNER ATTAINED'

answer.2: Lower secondary (secondary completed that does not allow entry to university: end of obligatory school)
answer.3: Upper secondary (programs that allows entry to university)
answer.4: Post secondary, non-tertiary (other upper secondary programs toward the labour market or technical formation)
answer.5: Lower level tertiary, first stage (also technical schools at a tertiary level)
answer.99: NAP (Code 3, 7 in PARTLIV), Not available (AT, DK, ES, FI, GB, HR, IS, JP, NZ, RU, SE, SK, SR, US, ZA)

LT.9: Does not know or no answer
